thread.title: Hall of Fame basketball player Harry Gallatin dies
thread.title_full: Hall of Fame basketball player Harry Gallatin dies

title: Hall of Fame basketball player Harry Gallatin dies
text: > Sports Hall of Fame basketball player Harry Gallatin dies FILE - In this Jan. 5, 1965, file photo, Harry Gallatin, coach of the New York knickerbockers, encourages his team team from the bench during an NBA basketball game with the Cincinnati Royals at Madison Square Garden in New York. Gallatin, a member of the National Basketball Hall of Fame, passed away at the age of 88, Southern Illinois University at Edwardsville announced, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. (AP Photo/John Lindsay, File)
